verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w is|strong="H1121"\w* flowing \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* good things; \w my|strong="H5921"\w* words \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* which \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* made \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*; \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pen \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* ready writer.

\w You|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* fairer \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* children \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w*; grace \w is|strong="H3820"\w* flowing \w through|strong="H3820"\w* \w your|strong="H0559"\w* lips; \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w cause|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* blessing \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3820"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* ever.

Put \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* sword, \w make|strong="H3302"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* ready \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* side, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* strong chief, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* glory \w and|strong="H1121"\w* power.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* go nobly \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* power, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1368"\w* good \w and|strong="H2719"\w* true \w and|strong="H2719"\w* without pride; \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* right hand \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H2719"\w* teaching \w you|strong="H5921"\w* things \w of|strong="H5921"\w* fear.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* arrows \w are|strong="H1697"\w* sharp \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* king's haters; \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples \w are|strong="H1697"\w* falling \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H8478"\w* seat \w of|strong="H4428"\w* power, O God, \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever \w and|strong="H4428"\w* ever; \w the|strong="H8478"\w* rod \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H8478"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H8478"\w* rod \w of|strong="H4428"\w* honour.

\w You|strong="H5703"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* \w a|strong="H0430"\w* lover \w of|strong="H0430"\w* righteousness \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H0430"\w* hater \w of|strong="H0430"\w* evil: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* so \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w your|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w has|strong="H0430"\w* put \w the|strong="H0430"\w* oil \w of|strong="H0430"\w* joy \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H0430"\w* head, lifting \w you|strong="H5703"\w* high over \w all|strong="H5769"\w* other kings.

\w Your|strong="H5921"\w* robes \w are|strong="H0430"\w* full \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* smell \w of|strong="H0430"\w* all sorts \w of|strong="H0430"\w* perfumes \w and|strong="H0430"\w* spices; music \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* king's ivory houses \w has|strong="H0430"\w* made \w you|strong="H5921"\w* glad.

Kings' daughters \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* noble women: \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* right \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* queen \w in|strong="H8055"\w* gold \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Ophir.

O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, give thought \w and|strong="H4428"\w* attention, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* let \w your|strong="H4428"\w* ear \w be|strong="H4428"\w* open; no longer keep \w in|strong="H4428"\w* mind \w your|strong="H4428"\w* people, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H4428"\w* father's house;

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* great desire \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w*, \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* how beautiful \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w*; \w because|strong="H5186"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* lord, \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* honour.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Tyre \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H0113"\w* there \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* offering; \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* wealth among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H0113"\w* looking \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* approval.

\w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* great house \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king's \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* all shining: \w her|strong="H1323"\w* clothing \w is|strong="H6440"\w* worked \w with|strong="H6440"\w* gold.

She \w will|strong="H4428"\w* come before \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w robes|strong="H3830"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* needlework; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* virgins \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* train \w will|strong="H4428"\w* come before \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w With|strong="H0935"\w* joy \w and|strong="H0935"\w* rapture \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* king's house.

\w Your|strong="H0935"\w* children \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w place|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* fathers; \w so|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* make \w them|strong="H0935"\w* rulers \w over|strong="H4428"\w* all \w the|strong="H0935"\w* earth.

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* keep \w the|strong="H3605"\w* memory \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* name living \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* generations; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w because|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* praise \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever.
